      • setTargetSize

        public ImageLoadConfig.Builder setTargetSize(@NonNull
                                             ImageLoadConfig.TargetSize targetSize)
        Overrides the image 's width and height finally show in ImageView with the given values. see ImageLoadConfig.TargetSize

        This is useful for thumbnails, and should only be used for other cases when you need a very specific image size.

      • setTransformations

        public ImageLoadConfig.Builder setTransformations(@NonNull
                                                  com.bumptech.glide.load.Transformation... transformations)
        set image transformation after image load successful.

        lib supply transformation:
        jp.wasabeef.glide.transformations.BlurTransformation
        jp.wasabeef.glide.transformations.CropCircleTransformation
        jp.wasabeef.glide.transformations.RoundedCornersTransformation
